author: Alex Davies, Aarian Marshall
title: Public Transit Cuts Hurt 'Essential' Workers Who Need It Most
description: Bus and train systems are trimming schedules amid plummeting ridership and mounting losses. But riders are being forced to choose between health and financial security.
content: Jason Young got up at 4am Friday. It was his daughters birthday, so hed taken the early shift at the Giant Food grocery store in Silver Spring, Maryland, where he manages the seafood department. Most of his colleagues drive to work, but Young doesnt have a ca… [+4723 chars]
